s.text: The big story today is what happens when blue tape meets red tape, with the House Judiciary wrangle over the release of Starr report evidence--including the Clinton video--leading at USA Today , the Washington Post , and the Los Angeles Times . The New York Times puts that story on the top front, but goes instead with Congress' likely decision to transfer control of satellite exports back to the State Dept. from the Commerce Dept., a development with its roots in a now-nearly forgotten Clinton technology-transfer-for-political-donations scandal broken last spring by the Times , a development nobody else's front page covers.
Both the USAT front page "cover story" and an inside story at the Post refer to the newly poisoned atmosphere as "sexual McCarthyism."
Both the USAT front page "cover story" and an inside story at the Post refer to the newly poisoned atmosphere as "sexual McCarthyism."
It's widely reported that the Republicans are winning all the particular votes on this matter--with the Clinton grand jury video expected to be made public by the weekend.

Both the NYT and the WP (which has been hitting such stories hard lately) report inside that dissidents attempting to register a democratically oriented political party in various parts of China were detained by police.
For God's sake, if a middle or high school principal in the area reads this item, get in touch with the Post and give this guy a jingle.

The big story today is what happens when blue tape meets red tape, with the House Judiciary wrangle over the release of Starr report evidence--including the Clinton video--leading at USA Today , the Washington Post , and the Los Angeles Times . The New York Times puts that story on the top front, but goes instead with Congress' likely decision to transfer control of satellite exports back to the State Dept. from the Commerce Dept., a development with its roots in a now-nearly forgotten Clinton technology-transfer-for-political-donations scandal broken last spring by the Times , a development nobody else's front page covers.
